document.full_text: while the nuclear crisis in japan unfolds a continent away, mormon-dominated communities in the western united states say the disaster overseas is bringing close to home a lesson about preparing for the worst.
document.title: japan crisis spurs survival planning by u.s. mormons
lines_and_colors: while the nuclear crisis in japan unfolds a continent away, mormon-dominated communities in the western united states say the disaster overseas is bringing close to home a lesson about preparing for the worst.
